isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (1997) - SECTION 3.5: CIRCUIT FUNCTION AND DIAGNOSTICS - CRUISE CONTROL, PTO, HAND THROTTLE SYSTEM - REMOTE PTO CONTROLS

svcproc.title: REMOTE PTO CONTROLS
svcproc.para: To use the remote controls, cruise control must be turned on using the cab cruise ON/OFF switch. The remote Set/Resume switch and disable switch are wired parallel to cab switches and operate in the same manner.

step1.para: Placing the remote PTO Preset switch in the ON position (closed) causes the PTO to operate at a preset engine speed (customer selected) programmed into the VPM.
Placing the remote PTO Variable switch in the ON position (closed) causes the PTO to operate using remote pedal.

note.para: If both of the above switches are on, the remote pedal is deactivated.
